overview: Ria Salvacion who has just given birth in the mysterious Bethlehem Hospital must protect her child against the undead, possessions and a dark cult who believe the anti-christ has been born. Three strangers, each gifted with their own unique skill, find themselves drawn to the hospital as well. There is Kaio, the prodigious boy detective with cancer; Jo, the transgendered sorcerer; and sister Luisa, the nun with a shotgun. Caught in the middle of the hellstorm, they form an unlikely alliance in order to save the child, and hopefully with it, the world.
title: Belen
